title: Here is a reading list of 20 articles on knowledge-enhanced dialogue systems (KEDS) for response generation, focusing on recent advancements and key research in the field

**"Knowledge-Grounded Dialogue Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"** - This paper explores the integration of external knowledge into pre-trained language models for more informed dialogue generation
A comprehensive survey that reviews various methods of incorporating knowledge into pre-trained language models for dialogue systems
**"Towards Knowledge-Grounded Open-Domain Conversational Agents"** - Discusses the challenges and methodologies for building open-domain conversational agents that leverage external knowledge sources
**"Dynamic Knowledge Graph Enhanced Dialogue Generation"** - Introduces a method for dynamically updating knowledge graphs to improve the relevance and accuracy of dialogue responses

**"Incorporating Commonsense Knowledge into Neural Dialogue Systems"** - Examines techniques for integrating commonsense knowledge into neural dialogue systems to enhance their conversational abilities

**"Knowledge-Aware Dialogue Generation with Pre-trained Language Models"** - Focuses on the use of pre-trained language models augmented with knowledge bases for generating more contextually appropriate responses
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Neural Conversational Models"** - Discusses various neural network architectures that incorporate external knowledge for improved dialogue generation
**"Leveraging Structured Knowledge for Conversational AI"** - Explores the use of structured knowledge sources, such as knowledge graphs
**"Knowledge-Infused Dialogue Generation with Graph Neural Networks"** - Investigates the application of graph neural networks to infuse knowledge into dialogue generation models
**"Contextual Knowledge Integration in Dialogue Systems"** - Reviews methods for integrating contextual knowledge into dialogue systems to enhance their understanding and response generation
**"Knowledge-Driven Response Generation in Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems"** - Focuses on the use of domain-specific knowledge to improve response generation in task-oriented dialogue systems
**"Enhancing Dialogue Systems with External Knowledge Sources"** - Discusses various external knowledge sources and how they can be integrated into dialogue systems for better performance
**"Knowledge-Augmented Transformer Models for Dialogue Generation"** - Explores the augmentation of transformer models with external knowledge for more informed dialogue generation
**"Commonsense Knowledge in Neural Dialogue Systems"** - Examines the role of commonsense knowledge in enhancing the conversational abilities of neural dialogue systems
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Response Generation with Memory Networks"** - Investigates the use of memory networks to store and retrieve knowledge for dialogue response generation
**"Incorporating External Knowledge into End-to-End Dialogue Systems"** - Reviews end-to-end approaches for integrating external knowledge into dialogue systems
**"Knowledge-Infused Pre-trained Models for Conversational AI"** - Discusses the infusion of knowledge into pre-trained models specifically for conversational AI applications
**"Knowledge-Enhanced Dialogue Generation with Reinforcement Learning"** - Explores the use of reinforcement learning to incorporate knowledge into dialogue generation models
**"Knowledge-Driven Conversational Agents: A Survey"** - A survey that provides an overview of the state-of-the-art in knowledge-driven conversational agents

**"Integrating Knowledge Bases with Neural Dialogue Systems"** - Reviews methods for integrating structured knowledge bases with neural dialogue systems to improve their response generation capabilities

These articles cover a range of topics within the field of knowledge-enhanced dialogue systems, from theoretical frameworks and surveys to specific methodologies and applications. They should provide a solid foundation for understanding the current state and future directions of KEDS for response generation
